document.full_text: the u.s. food and drug administration said it has received reports of clogging problems when a generic acid reflux drug made by teva pharmaceutical industries ltd is administered by oral syringe or feeding tubes.
document.title: fda warns against some use of teva reflux drug
lines_and_colors: the u.s. food and drug administration said it has received reports of clogging problems when a generic acid reflux drug made by teva pharmaceutical industries ltd is administered by oral syringe or feeding tubes.
